meanings.definition: To convert (a fat or oil) into soap by reaction with an alkali.
meanings.sent1: Mixing oil with lye saponifies it, creating soap.
meanings.sent2: The chemical reaction saponifies the oils, turning them into soap.
meanings.sent3: When the oil and lye dance together, they saponify into soap.
meanings.sent4: The transformation of oil into soap saponifies like magic.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen filled with the sweet scent as the oil saponified into soap.

meanings.definition: To undergo the process of becoming soap.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the mixture saponifies and solidifies into soap.
meanings.sent2: The ingredients slowly saponify, forming a bar of soap.
meanings.sent3: The liquid mixture eagerly saponifies, eager to become soap.
meanings.sent4: The oils happily saponify, ready to be used as soap.
meanings.sent5: The solution begins to saponify, transforming into a cleansing bar.
